data.title: BOW WOW WOW - I Want Candy
data.meta_description: Limited edition pink coloured vinyl   I Want Candy is a compilation album by Bow Wow Wow featuring their biggest hit I Want Candy. The album consists of all four tracks from their EP The Last of the Mohicans, four tracks from their debut album See Jungle! See Jungle! Go Join Your Gang Yeah, City All Over! Go Ape Crazy!, and the track El Boss Dicho, that comes from the B-side of the single Go Wild in the Country.The song I Want Candy was the band's most successful one and became an enduring new wave classic. It was a smash hit in the US, Europe and Australia and featured on VH1's "100 Greatest Songs of the '80s" list. The track was produced by Kenny Laguna who is known for his work with Joan Jett.Tracklisting: 1. I Want Candy 2. Baby, Oh No 3. Louis Quatorze 4. Cowboy 5. Mile High Club 6. Go Wild In The Country 7. Jungle Boy 8. El Boss Dicho 9. (I'm A) T.V. Savage 10. King Kong
data.text:
I Want Candy is a compilation album by Bow Wow Wow featuring their biggest hit I Want Candy. The album consists of all four tracks from their EP The Last of the Mohicans, four tracks from their debut album See Jungle! See Jungle! Go Join Your Gang Yeah, City All Over! Go Ape Crazy!, and the track El Boss Dicho, that comes from the B-side of the single Go Wild in the Country.

The song I Want Candy was the band's most successful one and became an enduring new wave classic. It was a smash hit in the US, Europe and Australia and featured on VH1's "100 Greatest Songs of the '80s" list. The track was produced by Kenny Laguna who is known for his work with Joan Jett.

Tracklisting:

1. IWantCandy

2. Baby, Oh No

3. Louis Quatorze

4. Cowboy

5. Mile High Club

6. Go Wild In The Country

7. Jungle Boy

8. El Boss Dicho

9. (I'm A) T.V. Savage

10. King Kong
